products.productDescription: Use VTP to shift-left your application integration testing and understand the impact of a change before it is deployed. VTP lets you test an entire transaction, running a code change in the context of other programs that are part of the transaction in the build phase.

IBM Z® Anomaly Analytics with Watson™ provides intelligent anomaly detection to proactively discern operational issues in your enterprise environment. It uses historical IBM Z metric and log data to build a model of normal operational behavior. Real-time data is then scored against the model to detect, and alert IT operations of, anomalous behavior.

products.productName: IBM Z Performance and Capacity Analytics
products.productDescription: IBM Z Decision Support for Capacity Planning delivers a simple, out-of-the-box Capacity Planning solution based on performance data curated in near real time.

products.productName: IBM Z Application Performance Management Connect
products.productDescription: IBM Z Application Performance Management Connect provides transaction tracking information from z/OS subsystems to APM solutions.

products.productDescription: IBM Z Application Performance Management Connect provides transaction tracking information from z/OS subsystems to APM solutions.
